name: George W. Bush Presidential Center Reviews

review.title: “President Bush's desire for a "do tank" rather than a think tank has produced something effective and good.”
review.pros: Pros – Team-oriented environment, with the feel of a startup company since it's still growing. Commitment to producing positive change by competent leadership and staff.
review.cons: Cons – Budget constraints (since it's a non-profit) can lead to pressure on small workgroups at times. Not awful though.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The management is great -- no complaints or advice.
